summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 3.2 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 319 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1898 m), feels like temperature (up 2.0°C), outside temperature (up 2.4°C), and inside temperature (up 2.4°C) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 318.6m lower than yesterday, 833.6m lower than the past week, 1898.3m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 713m minimum and 1594m maximum, with an average of 748.3m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1581.9m and 2650m.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, extremely heavy humidity levels and little or no wind. Rain showers likely, occasional overcast conditions, and it’s dark. Changeable conditions.
